title: Unbanning a very old (beta old) account for my birthday?
body:
First off, I know what I did was wrong. I was super toxic, this was quite awhile ago so if it's a no. I get it. I mean we are talking 3,4, maybe 5 years ago now? I've since have had a kid, gotten married. And I wish I could say so many whimsical things to win you over. But the fact is, I failed to uphold my part of the ToS. So if it's a no, it's no harm. I just have been kinda wanting to play again. Been trying it out on my brothers account because I don't really have the time to level to 30 anymore with the kid and all, and I had quite a bit of money tied into that account.

So if it's any possibility to blow into this candle and make a wish on my 32nd birthday and it come true. That'd be pretty neat, if not. Again I get it. Most wishes don't work anyways, right?

Did a 32 year old really just use his wish for a video game? My god.

replies.body:
Ah man, I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but we can't lift bans like this for birthdays =( . I can see about helping your new account get leveled up a bit quicker if you'd like, but I also needed to point out that account sharing is indeed against the ToS as well. 

Hit me up with the Summoner name of your new account if you'd like and I can see about helping you level a bit quicker.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WHX7TH8h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T02:37:33.172+0000)
>
> Ah man, I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but we can't lift bans like this for birthdays =( . I can see about helping your new account get leveled up a bit quicker if you'd like, but I also needed to point out that account sharing is indeed against the ToS as well. 
> 
> Hit me up with the Summoner name of your new account if you'd like and I can see about helping you level a bit quicker.

It's no problem, I only tried his account for a few games to make sure it wasn't just a spasm, so I apologize. I'll make sure to refrain from further using it. Not that I have in the past few days anyways. And it's no hard feelings you aren't bearing any bad news. It's pretty much what I expected the result to be. Not a big deal.

I appreciate the offer you have given me, and don't take it as I don't appreciate it. But honestly if I cant' get the old account back no reason for you to delve into making something work for me. If I had to repurchase runes, champions, and all that jazz all over again I'd rather just devote that into something else.

I appreciate the help, and the response though.
Best wishes.
